DOC.brief_summary: This study design alternative urodynamic platform well evaluate treatment effect medication overactive bladder . Part II dependent result Part I may conduct .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Test Effects Tolterodine Tartrate Patients With Overactive Bladder ( 0000-107 )
DOC.criteria: Patient postmenopausal female 40 75 year age Patient Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less equal 35 kg/m2 Patient document history overactive bladder least 6 month prior screen Patient stress mixed incontinence Patient history interstitial cystitis , painful bladder syndrome , chronic pelvic pain Patient history stroke , seizure , major neurological disorder Patient history fecal incontinence Patient history continual urine leakage Patient surgery correct stress urinary incontinence pelvic organ prolapse within 6 month study start Patient receive bladder train electrostimulation within 2 week study start Patient require catheter Patient take medication stop duration trial include certain anticholinergic smooth muscle relaxant Patient begin take tricyclic antidepressant , serotonin/norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor , calcium channel blocker , ephedrine/pseudoephedrine , diuretic therapy le 8 week study start Patient hormone replacement therapy le 12 week study start Patient must take medication arrhythmia Patient consume 2 alcoholic beverage per day Patient consume 3 serving caffeinated beverage per day ( 1 serve = 120 mg caffeine ) Patient multiple and/or severe allergy food drug Patient regularly use illegal drug
